{% hook 'formie.buttons.start' %} {# Next button goes first. https://stackoverflow.com/a/1963285 #} {% set submitAttributes = { class: [ 'fui-btn', 'fui-submit', nextPage ? 'fui-next', ], type: 'submit', 'data-field-conditions': page.settings.getConditionsJson(), } | merge(options.buttons.submit ?? {}) | merge(inputAttributes) %} {% if page.settings.showBackButton and prevPage %} {% set prevAttributes = { class: [ 'fui-btn', 'fui-prev', ], type: 'submit', name: 'goingBack', onclick: 'this.form.goBack = true;', } | merge(options.buttons.prev ?? {}) | merge(inputAttributes) %} {% endif %} {% hook 'formie.buttons.end' %}
